incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the elevated 500 errors in multiple Twilio products triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that they're related to the existing StatusPage post at https://status.twilio.com/incidents/9z5mdhxc05d0. Please continue to look for additional updates in that active post.

We are currently investigating an elevated rate of 500 errors in Proxy, Studio, Flex, Voice, Conversations, Messaging channels as WhatsApp, Facebook and Google conversations. Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Messaging. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Stale Call Data Affecting Programmable Voice - Call Resource API

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Voice - Call Resource API was degraded for 36 minutes between 21:01 and 21:37 Pacific Time on 10/02/2023. During this period of time, a subset of customers may have experienced stale call data. The issue has now been resolved.
